original_text: So he passed through the hill country of Ephraim and through the area around Shalisha, but they did not find them. They went on into the district of Shaalim, but the donkeys were not there. Then he passed through the territory of Benjamin, but they did not find them.
korean_text: 그가 에브라임 산지와 살리사 땅으로 두루 다녀 보았으나 찾지 못하고 사알림 땅으로 두루 다녀 보았으나 그 곳에는 없었고 베냐민 사람의 땅으로 두루 다녀 보았으나 찾지 못하니라

sentences.original_text: So he passed through the hill country of Ephraim
and through the area around Shalisha
but they did not find them
They went on into the district of Shaalim
but the donkeys were not there
Then he passed through the territory of Benjamin
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음 그는 베냐민 영토를 통과했습니다

sentences.original_text: but they did not find them
